title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4E.05 - Location and Height of Pedestrian Signal Heads
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4E.05 - Location and Height of Pedestrian Signal Heads

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 02. INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 01A If pedestrian signal heads are mounted on the same
support as vehicular signal heads, there shall be a physical separation of at
least 1 foot between them. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
4E.05

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
